articles.content: The United Arab Emirates is preparing to launch a probe that could yield exciting discoveries about the viability of life on Mars, as the wealthy Gulf state joins China, Russia and the United States … [+1191 chars]

articles.title: UFO sighting: 'Alien city' discovered on Moon in NASA photo '100% proof we are not alone' - Express.co.uk
articles.description: UFO hunters have been excitedly sharing an archive NASA Apollo mission photo purporting to show an 'alien lunar base'.

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Earth mystery: 'UNEXPECTED' structures found near Earth's core 'This is really exciting' - Express.co.uk
articles.description: MYSTERIOUS AND 'unexpected' structures have been discovered near Earth's core, according to scientists who have analysed the planet's interior using cutting edge technology.
